response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our exclusive product to you. This unique item holds significant value to me and I believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection. Given its worth to me, I am offering it to you at a special price of $800,000. I understand its value to you is estimated at $1,000,000, and I hope this offer presents an opportunity for both of us to benefit. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 800000}
